entry.title: Application round for flexible study rights (JOO) for studies starting in autumn 2018 opens 1.3.2018
entry.content: The flexible JOO study right enables graduate and postgraduate students to apply for a study right to another Finnish university, for example to complete a minor module or take individual courses.

entry.title: Transferring to the new degree programmes - instruction page has been published
